meta.title: HandsFree.tech - AI Voice Ordering for Restaurants | Restaurant AI OS
meta.description: Transform your restaurant with AI-powered web voice ordering. Customers order directly from your website using voice commands. 24/7 availability, save on third-party commissions.

hero.headline:
Run your entire restaurant.
From one place.
hero.subheadline:
Everything you need to run the restaurant — in one place
Menu Management · Marketing & Communication · Point of Sale (POS) · Online Presence with Voice ordering · Payments*
hero.description: A complete restaurant management suite designed for restaurants of all sizes. Join the waitlist to unlock frontier pricing: 50% off + 1 month free.
hero.disclaimer: *Payment & Last Mile Delivery integration available for restaurants with existing partnerships.

features.headline:
Everything your restaurant needs.
Nothing that gets in the way.

online_presence.title: Your Custom Online Presence
online_presence.description: Fully themable, multilingual website — built automatically from your menu.

menu_management.title: Centralised Menu Management
menu_management.description: One menu. Everywhere it needs to be. Update once, reflect everywhere.

aggregator_integration.title: Seamless Aggregator Integration
aggregator_integration.description: Keep using Swiggy, Zomato, Uber Eats, DoorDash — all orders flow into one system.

pos.title: Modern, Intuitive POS
pos.description: Designed for speed during rush. Staff management, table assignment, and course timing.

kis.title: Intelligent Kitchen Display
kis.description: Smart KDS that keeps every station in sync. Orders routed automatically, timed perfectly.

customer_intelligence.title: Built-in Customer Intelligence
customer_intelligence.description: Turn guests into regulars. Track preferences and automate personalised campaigns.

data_security.title: Data Security & Control
data_security.description: Dedicated encrypted storage. One-click full backup and export — download everything anytime.

waitlist_cta.title: Ready to transform your restaurant?
waitlist_cta.description: Join the exclusive group of partners shaping the future of dining.

how_it_works.headline: From Zero to Live in Minutes

step1.title: Smart Menu Import
step1.description: Upload your menu via Excel. Our AI uses fuzzy logic to automatically match your items with high-quality images.

step2.title: Instant Generation
step2.description: Your fully-featured, voice-enabled website and ordering system are created automatically.

step3.title: Real-Time Command
step3.description: Manage incoming orders, track kitchen status, and monitor revenue on your live dashboard.

waitlist.headline: Limited Spots Available.
waitlist.description: We are rolling out to a select group of partners. Don't miss your chance to lock in frontier pricing.

form.name: Restaurant Name
form.success: You're on the list! We'll be in touch soon.

final_cta.headline: Ready to upgrade your
final_cta.pricing: Join the waitlist for exclusive 50% off pricing

demo.helper_text: Click the microphone to start voice ordering
demo.error: Could not load the restaurant interface

footer.tagline: AI-powered voice ordering for restaurants. Increase direct orders, save on commissions, serve in 40+ languages.

hero.headline: Empower Your F&B Business with Restaurant OS
hero.subheadline: Join the Handsfree.tech partner network. Bring the world's most advanced Voice-First Restaurant OS to your local markets and grow your business.

revenue.title: Uncapped Earning Potential
revenue.description: Earn recurring revenue and generous commissions for every restaurant you transition to our AI-powered OS.

integration.title: Tailored for Your Market
integration.description: Tools and support built to help you dominate your local F&B technology market from day one.

support.title: Enterprise Partner Support
support.description: Direct access to our product and technical teams to ensure your partners and clients succeed.

step1.title: Apply & Connect
step1.description: Submit your application to join our global network of F&B technology providers.

step2.title: Market Mastery
step2.description: Get certified on the Restaurant OS and learn how to position it for maximum impact in your region.

step3.title: Deploy & Grow
step3.description: Start onboarding restaurants in your market and build a sustainable recurring revenue stream.

downloadGate.headline: Get Restaurant AI OS
downloadGate.subheadline: Enter your details to access downloads
downloadGate.privacy: Your information is secure and will only be used for download access and product updates.

downloads.headline: Download Restaurant AI OS
downloads.subheadline: Choose your platform to get started

desktop.title: Desktop Apps
desktop.description: Full-featured desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Includes POS integration, offline mode, and advanced analytics.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Manage your restaurant on the go with our mobile apps. Track orders, view analytics, and update your menu from anywhere.

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. You can manage your preferences or learn more in our

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Enable personalized features and remember your preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
